title: Can I delete my Unity ID account?

sections.title: Symptoms
content:
• I do not want my Unity ID account any more. 
  • I wish to delete my Unity ID account.

sections.title: Cause
content: You are no longer using Unity and do not need the account. You may have multiple accounts and no longer wish to use one of them.

sections.title: Resolution
content: Unfortunately, it is not possible for users to delete their own Unity ID accounts at this time. You can contact us to disable accounts however. This means that the account will no longer be accessible. Please make sure the request is coming from the e-mail linked to the account.

sections.title: More Information
content: If you would like to be removed from our mailing list, please state this so that we can add the e-mail to our blocked list.
